{{infobox character | people=[[Númenóreans|Númenórean]] | name=Oromendil | image= | caption= | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location=[[Númenor]] | affiliation= | language=[[Adûnaic]] and [[Sindarin]] | birth={{SA|382}} | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house=[[House of Elros]] | parentage=[[Nolondil]] | siblings=[[Yávien]] and [[Axantur]] | spouse= | children= | gender=Male | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Oromendil''' was the second child and oldest son of [[Nolondil]], the brother of [[Tar-Amandil]], [[King of Númenor]]. Though he left descendants, nothing of their lives was recorded.{{UT|earlier}} ==Etymology== ''Oromendil'' is a [[Quenya]] name. Its meaning is not glossed, but Paul Strack suggests it means "Friend of [[Oromë]]" and is a compound of ''Oromë'' ("the name of the Valar, which literally means Horn-blowing") and ''[[dil|-(n)dil]]'' ("friend, lover, devoted to").{{webcite|author=Paul Strack|articleurl=https://www.eldamo.org/content/words/word-1062937831.html|articlename=Q.
